(While writing this, I remembered that the ship Manterror, Injector, Double 
Punch, AND Stinkbomb all arrived on Past Earth with is still in pretty good 
shape...hmmm, forgetting something like that is pretty stupid)


Manterror/ Injector/ Stinkbomb/ Ramhorn:

::Manterror and Injector looked to each other::
"Is this the control room?" (Injector whispered)

"Yeah, on the count of three..." (Manterror whispered back)

::Manterror fired four ion disks, two on each side::

::Injector fired two stinger missiles, the large metal door in front of them 
blowing inwad::

"What the slag!  Manterror you dolt, this is the engine room!" (Injector 
screamed as his audio receptors brought in hums of macinery) (Due to lack of 
knowledge on the Ark's engine room, I won't describe it that much, because I 
can't)
"Then again...Manterror, my brilliant leadership may have just led us to the 
thing that could turn the Battle of the Ark!" (Injector said, deciding to 
name the battle, thinking that it will be the last at the Autobot craft)

=======================================================

::Stinkbomb and Ramhorn both heard a loud boom and stood, weapon sin hand::

"What the slag was that?!" (Stinkbomb yelled)

"An explosion, most likely." (Ramhorn loaded a fresh clip into his 
sub-machine gun)
"And probably Predacons."

::Stinkbomb raised his tail rifle, walking cautiously towards the source of 
the explosion, which wasn't that far away, backed up by Ramhorn::

============

::Manterror looked to Injector, who looked back to him::
"I know...th...that's why I led us here...I decided it would be be-MAXIMALS!" 
(he yelled spotting the barrel of Stinkbomb's tail gun, firing off two ion 
disks at the area the figure was moving towards, the disks slicing the barrel 
of the gun off::

"You idiot, wait until you can see them!" 
::Injector fired a stinger missile, the missile slamming into a wall::

::Ramhorn grabbed Stinkbomb, pulling him back::
"Watch it!" ::Ramhorn pulled out his laser pistol from subpsace, handing it 
to a once unarmed Stinkbomb::

::Stinkbomb shut his optics as blinding light from a stinger missile flooded 
his optics, letting loose a few laser blasts at where the missile hit to try 
and distract the attackers, raising his deadly seringed tail::

-----------------

::Double Punch stood, looking to Hell Beast::
::Raising a pincher, he fired a missile into the cieling for the fun of it::
(More damage takes more time for the enemies to repair!) he thought to himself

==========

::Manterror saw the bolts hit the wall, causing no harm to himself::

::Injector fired another missile, looking around:: 

=The deeper they (Injector and Manterror) had gotten into the engine room, 
the louder the hum of machinery.  It was somewhat loud now.  To the right of 
him (Injector) was a large piece of equipment, shaped like a prism with a few 
appendages coming from the sides, the appendages long rectangles sticking 
into the walls of the engine room.  He could see two computer terminals, but 
that was only half the engine room=

::Manterror stepped back, firing two ion disks::

"Careful where you fire!  You might hit something vital!" (Injector firing 
two missiles)
-I guess I should try going around-
"Manterror," he whispered, "I'm going to circle around, keep the fire going." 

"Sure!" 
::Manterror fired two more ion disks, Injector giving him a disapproving 
glance, though the mantis kept shooting::
